    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3244</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Petry Questions for the Oral Matric examination</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Petry Fragen für die Mundmatric Prüfung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Questions de Petry pour l'examen Matriciel 
oral</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Perguntas de Petry para a examinação oral de 
Matric</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domande di Petry per l'esame orale di Matric</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωτήσεις Petry για την προφορική εξέταση μητρών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Preguntas de Petry para la examinación oral de 
Matric</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a worksheet with questions about 6 poems studied for Matric, in preparation for an oral Examination.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">poetry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oral expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">test</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Bogen mit Fragen über 6 Gedichte,
die für Matric, in der Vorbereitung für eine Mundprüfung studiert 
werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un tableau avec des questions environ 6 
poésies étudiées pour Matriciel, en vue d'un examen oral.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma folha com perguntas aproximadamente 6
poemas estudados para Matric, na preparação para uma examinação 
oral.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un foglio di lavoro con le domande circa 
6 poems studiati per Matric, in preparazione per un esame orale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα φύλλο εργασίας με τις ερωτήσεις 6 
ποιήματα που μελετώνται για για τη μήτρα, σε προετοιμασία για μια 
προφορική εξέταση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una hoja de trabajo con preguntas cerca 
de 6 poemas estudiados para Matric, en la preparación para una 
examinación oral.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
